description: Deliciously sweet with hints of orange and spice, this honey-roasted carrots recipe is easy to prepare and a must-try for lunch or dinner.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Discovery Garden,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dec 2020,Peanut free
name: HoneyRoasted Carrots Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fanforced. Grease a large baking tray.

Combine cumin, fennel seeds, zest and oil in a large bowl. Add carrot, season, then toss to coat. Arrange on tray and bake for 20 minutes. Drizzle over honey, scatter over thyme and bake for a further 20 minutes or until carrots are tender.
Dollop yoghurt on a platter, top with carrot, spoon over pan juices and serve.
